meta.title: 770: Portrait of the Rebbe in Red by Eliran Bar-On
meta.description: A contemporary oil painting depicting the Lubavitcher Rebbe against a bold red background, symbolizing the Chabad headquarters.

openGraph.og:title: 770: Portrait of the Rebbe in Red by Eliran Bar-On
openGraph.og:description: Discover Eliran Bar-On's contemporary portrait of the Lubavitcher Rebbe, set against a bold red background with symbolic '770'.

structuredData.name: 770: Portrait of the Rebbe in Red
structuredData.description: This striking portrait depicts the Lubavitcher Rebbe against a bold red background, featuring the symbolic number '770', representing the Chabad headquarters.
